xml.brief: Retrieve data on multiple attributes at once

desc.p: This method works like the attribute method, but with multiple A-codes instead of only one. Read the docs for the attribute method first!

xml.req: Pipe-separated list of A-codes you're interested in.
xml.opt: Works the same as in the attribute method.
Works the same as in the attribute method.
This has a similar meaning as in the attribute method, but works differently. If set to false, OKAPI will return nulls for unknown keys (A-codes). You will still receive an HTTP 200 response though!

returns.p: A dictionary. A-codes you provide will be mapped to dictionary keys, and each value will be an object, as described in the attribute method.
